EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-01-23-Field-East-RD-Sponsored-Montreal.ES-2017-12-04-Montreal-01.EMAIL
EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: Canadiens v. Avalanche Executive Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-montreal/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're getting ready to host an exclusive event with our friends at Cisco as the Montreal Canadiens take on the Colorado Avalanche. At Turbonomic, our users are the core of our organization. They drive the evolution of our technology, shape our company culture, and even inspired out name change from VMTurbo to Turbonomic last August. Join us and Cisco in the new year to learn about what it means to be a Turbonomic customer. Montreal Canadiens vs Colorado Avalanche
Where: Centre Bell 1909 Avenue des Canadiens-de-Montreal, Montreal, QC H4b 5G0, Canada Tuesday, January 23rd 6:30pm
Save the date for January 23rd at 6:30PM by registering at the following link: http://turbonomic.com/vip-montreal <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-montreal/]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
